TopicTitle: What altitudes do parachutes fully deploy on Laythe?

Articles.Content: At what altitude do the drogue and normal parachutes fully deploy on Jool's moon Laythe?

Same altitude then on other planets I guess - the part file sets a height for this, not a atmospheric density - there was a minimum density too, but this should be well reached so far down in the atmosphere.
The same regardless of the body, which means 500m above the ground for normals and (IIRC) 2500m for drogues.
